divs: Sighting Detailshi, i have a crazy story. i was coming out of walmart in boardman last night at a little after 11 pm. i was walking toward my vehicle and this light in the sky caught my eyes. i look up and saw 3 yellow lights in a straight line coming toward me. at first i thought hellicopters. thay were very low and moving very slow. then they changed formation and turned north toward lowes. i drove over to lowes parking lot and got out of my car. they went right over me and i couldnt hear any engine noise. thats crazy because they were low as emergency hellicopters fly. i should of heard some kind of noise. also i couldnt see any kind of shape to them which was also wierd because of how low they were. shortly after they passed over lowes they disappeared. as i was watching this a young couple pulled in and also saw this happening. it was unbelieveable and awsome!
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Youngstown
There were no other sightings in Youngstown on or around August 15th 2009
